content: Hi all, I am using the IG Publisher toolchain with binary adjunct support for making FHIR Library for each CQL Library. The toolchain does a nice job creating the FHIR resource, however for my use case I need the ELM in application/elm+json (and not eml+xml). Is there a setting in the IG Publisher to make this happen? Thanks!

Hi Brian. You can add a cql-options.json file to the cql folder in your IG to set translator options. Here's an example:
https://github.com/cqframework/ecqm-content-r4/blob/master/input/cql/cql-options.json
